string.name: STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_IDElemental_1
string.body: Elementis Forest;An enchanted forest in the northwest of Sarpan that is protected by the Luminous Sapling.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_IDElemental_2
string.body: Argent Manor;A cliffside mansion in Elementis Forest. It was built by the sorcerer Davlin so that she could research and build Golems in close proximity to the Luminous Sapling.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_idf4re_drana_SZ_Stage_02_1
string.body: Drana Production Lab;A research center and refinery in the Esoterrace. It processes Drana to produce Dratamin, Surkina, and other materials.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_idf4re_drana_SZ_Stage_03_2
string.body: Esoterrace Secret Laboratory;Surama's secret laboratory beneath the Esterrace. It connects to the Air Conditioning Room by a Secret Passage.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_idf4re_drana_SZ_Stage_02_4
string.body: Laboratory Air Conditioning Room;Not just for cooling air. This room houses the controls for the Drana Esoterrace and the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_idf4re_drana_SZ_Stage_02_1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_idf4re_drana_SZ_Stage_01_2
string.body: Drana Esoterrace;The Esoterrace's Drana production region. It has improved both the quality and output of Drana by using Elm.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_idf4re_drana_SZ_Stage_03_5
string.body: Esoterrace Bio Lab;An experimental laboratory beneath the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_idf4re_drana_SZ_Stage_03_2].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_Arena_L_Lobby
string.body: Kaisinel Academy;A training camp under direct control of Kaisinel. It is also open to ordinary Daevas to improve the Elyos' military strength. You can get to the training camp through [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LC1_LC2_TELEPORT] in Sanctum.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_Arena_D_Lobby
string.body: Marchutan Academy;A training camp under direct control of Marchutan. It is also open to ordinary Daevas to improve the Asmodian' military strength. You can get to the training camp through [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_DC1_DC2_TELEPORT] in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDStation_SZ_Station
string.body: Aturam Sky Fortress;A Dredgion repair and maintenance station. Silion at Garldar Village has information on how to gain access to this Balaur fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDStation_SZ_Start
string.body: Aturam Sky Fortress;Aturam Sky Fortress

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDStation_SZ_NPC
string.body: Elevator;Elevator

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDStation_SZ_Lobby
string.body: Central Corridor;Central Corridor

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDStation_SZ_01_A
string.body: Sky Fortress Warehouse Zone;A zone that houses weapons and supplies for the Fortress. You can get there by turning left from the Central Corridor.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDStation_SZ_01_B_1
string.body: Material Supply Base;Material Supply Base

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDStation_SZ_01_B_2
string.body: Weapon Supply Base;Weapon Supply Base

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDStation_SZ_01_Named
string.body: Talon Laboratory;Talon Laboratory

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDStation_SZ_02_A
string.body: Dredgion Fabrication Zone;An area of the Sky Fortress that houses the Dredgion's controls. You can get there through the center exit of the Central Corridor.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDStation_SZ_02_Named
string.body: Supervisor's Workshop;Supervisor's Workshop

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDStation_SZ_03_A
string.body: Airship Dock;Airship Dock

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDStation_SZ_03_B
string.body: Sky Fortress Command Center;The heart of Aturam Sky Fortress, where they Drakan fortress commanders are located. You'll have to take the Steam Tachysphere to reach the Command Center.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDStation_SZ_03_C_1
string.body: Drakan Operations Room;Drakan Operations Room

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDStation_SZ_03_C_2
string.body: Drakan Control Room;Drakan Control Room

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDStation_SZ_03_Named
string.body: Ashunatal's Ready Room;Ashunatal's Ready Room

string.name: STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_IDYun
string.body: Rentus Base;This covert Reian training base and weapons smithy was built perilously close to Balaur territory.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDYun_SZ_2
string.body: Sparring Grounds;A training ground for Reian warriors to practice and hone their skills.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDYun_SZ_5
string.body: Siel Smithy;A Reian weapons forge that creates powerful tools of war.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDYun_SZ_3
string.body: Residential Zone;The Barracks and housing for Rentus Base troops.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDRaksha_Whole
string.body: Raksang;An ancient Balaur dungeon where the dragon Raksha has been sealed for centuries. It is now accessible through Arza's Corridor.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDRaksha_2F
string.body: Terror's Vault;An old crypt used as a dungeon in Raksang. Ethereal blue light marks the path from Raksang Dungeon Chasm to the Vault's entrance.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDRaksha_3F
string.body: Torment's Forge;A dungeon in Raksang that is choked with endless flames. Molten red light marks the path from the Flight Area to the Vault's entrance.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDRaksha_4F
string.body: Hellpath;The gate to the Hellpath is in Raksang, at the bottom of the Raksang Depths.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_OP_A4
string.body: Garnon's Secret Chamber;Access to Garnon's secret room is usually allowed by summons only.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T1_S8
string.body: Heart of Fissure;A source of Tiamat's power guarded by the Dragon Lord's avatar, Fissure Incarnate.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T2_S10
string.body: Heart of Gravity;A source of Tiamat's power guarded by the Dragon Lord's avatar, Gravity Incarnate.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T3_S7
string.body: Heart of Wrath;A source of Tiamat's power guarded by the Dragon Lord's avatar, Wrath Incarnate.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T4_S6
string.body: Heart of Petrification;A source of Tiamat's power guarded by the Dragon Lord's avatar, Petrification Incarnate.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T2_S12
string.body: Watcher's Hill;A hill overlooking the Heart of Gravity that provides a clear view of the Heart and is useful as an observation post.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T1_S9
string.body: Outcrop Overlook;A outcrop above the Heart of Fissure that offers an unobstructed view of the Heart and is useful for reconnaisance.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T3_A6
string.body: Wrath Vent;An area destabilized by its proximity to the Wrath Power. The creatures in this area seem to be affected by the volcanic steam that vents nearby.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T2_A6
string.body: Gravity Well;An area affected by the Gravity Power. The creatures in this area are twisted by proximity to Tiamat's power.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDRaksha_ItemUseArea_Q28703
string.body: Magma Flow;Seething magma that builds up in the bottom of Raksang.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP
string.body: Kamar;The magnificent Reian capital city in central [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_sarpan_main], built in defiance of the constant threat from Tiamat and his Balaur servants.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_01
string.body: Sarpan Capitol;The main council chamber of the Reian Elders, where Kahrun and his senior officals discuss the future of the Reian Tribe.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_02
string.body: Griffoen Boarding Site;This chamber allows access to the Elyos airship, Griffoen.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_03
string.body: Habrok Boarding Site;This chamber allows access to the Asmodian airship, Habrok.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_04
string.body: Main Conference Hall;A chamber in the Sarpan Capitol used for the Elders' private councils.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_05
string.body: Great Square of Peace;The wide central fountain square in the Reian capital, Kamar.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_06
string.body: Kahrun Guard Headquarters;This legion, commanded by Kahrun Guard Brigade General [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Kutos], is headquartered in the northeast of the Reian capital, Kamar.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_07
string.body: Siel's Spear Headquarters;Headquartered in east Kamar, this legion is commanded by Elder [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Raffaele].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_08
string.body: Drana Research Library;A Reian laboratory for research on Drana energy.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_09
string.body: Jotun Research Library;A library compiling all Reian knowledge regarding the Jotun, built over many years by the researcher [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Acheron].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_10
string.body: Spero Residential Parish;The residential district of Kamar, where the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_17] is located.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_11
string.body: Kamena Development District;An area of Kamar under rapid development as directed by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Salomone].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_12
string.body: Kamar Dungeon;A prison dug deep beneath the city of Kamar. Its entrance is north of Lamina Bazaar.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_15
string.body: Lamina Bazaar;Kamar's busy commercial district, populated by traders and merchants of all kinds.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_16
string.body: Room of Relativity;This room is what you make of it.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_17
string.body: Bivarus Tavern;A famously rowdy tavern in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_10].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_18
string.body: Siel Temple;A temple built in honor of Empyrean Lady Siel, Lady of Time and Guardian of the East, whose noble self-sacrifice during the Cataclysm saved Atreia from total destruction.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_19
string.body: Griffoen;The Elyos fleet flagship, currently docked in Kamar. You can reach the Griffoen through a Warship Crew or Warship Teleport Statue.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_20
string.body: Habrok;The Asmodian flagship, currently docked in Kamar. You can reach the Habrok through a Warship Crew or Warship Teleport Statue.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_21
string.body: Mephitic Caverns;The twisting caverns dug by burrowing Klaw. One has recently broken through a wall in the Kamar Dungeon.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1
string.body: Kamar Outskirts;The lands surrounding the Reian capital. These areas are mostly forested, save for the desert fronting the eastern city entrance.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1_01
string.body: Kamar Road Outpost;A guard post watching the road leading to Kamar's west entrance.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1_02
string.body: Refugee Camp;A temporary camp housing those fleeing Balaur attack and seeking the safety of the Reian capital. It is in the desert of the Kamar Outskirts, near the southeast city walls.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1_03
string.body: Southern Guardian's Seal;A Guardian Seal in the north of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_D]. The [%dic:STR_DIC_E_guardstone_Q41256] here prevents Tiamat's power from destroying this region of Sarpan.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1_04
string.body: Redclaw Steppe;This hilly area between Kamar and the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_01] is especially dangerous at night.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2
string.body: Trepone Forest;This northern Sarpan forest was once razed to build Drana plantations, but has since returned to its natural state.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2_01
string.body: Garldar Village;A Reian village in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2], which escaped the Dredgion bombardment.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2_02
string.body: Menin Village;A Reian village in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2] completely decimated by Dredgion bombings.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2_03
string.body: Luman Village;A Reian village razed by Dredgion bombings and overrun with Shulack and Drakan forces.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2_04
string.body: Dredgion Bombing Area;A region of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2] heavily bombed by Balaur Dredgions.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2_05
string.body: Nalotia's Cabin;A cabin in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2] where the Herb Gatherer [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Nalotia] lives.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2_06
string.body: Solace Cavern;An isolated, well-protected cave that seems to have served as some kind of shelter in the past, though its occupants are long gone.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2_07
string.body: Wildflower Field;A field crowded with wild flowers, including the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF4a_Dandelion_Big].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A3
string.body: Cucutero Grove;An ancient forest spreading across southwest Sarpan that is sacred to the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_ldf4a_Owllau_fam] Strigik.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A3_01
string.body: Western Guardian's Seal;The [%dic:STR_DIC_E_guardstone_Q41256] here prevents Tiamat's power from destroying the western region of Sarpan. It is well-fortified.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A3_02
string.body: Hunter's Blind;This overlook commands an unbroken view of the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_ldf4a_Owllau_fam]'s territory.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A3_03
string.body: Urugugu Village;The village of the warrior Strigik [%dic:STR_DIC_E_ldf4a_Owllau_fam], in the south of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A3].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A3_04
string.body: Urugugu Garrison;An encampment of the most elite and powerful [%dic:STR_DIC_E_ldf4a_Owllau_fam] warriors.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A3_05
string.body: Ashishav's Nest;A sacred tree named in honor of the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_ldf4a_Owllau_fam] patron of battle.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A3_08
string.body: Chief Uliuru's Territory;Land claimed by the Chief Uliuru.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_01
string.body: Eastern Guardian's Seal;The [%dic:STR_DIC_E_guardstone_Q41256] sited above Redclaw Steppe prevents Tiamat's power from destroying the eastern region of Sarpan.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_02
string.body: Ancestor's Shrine;An altar in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_03] dedicated to the Calydon cult of the ancestors.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_03
string.body: Humnaz Territory;Land in the eastern Sarpan deserts claimed by the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF4a_calydon_fam].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_04
string.body: Humnaz Garrison;An encampment of elite [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF4a_calydon_fam] warriors.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_05
string.body: Haridoo's Lodge;The lodge of the Humnaz Tribe's ruler, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_Calydonchief_Nmd_57_Ah], who has kept control of the tribe for an unprecedented length of time.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_06
string.body: Warrior's Shrine;An altar in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_04] dedicated to the Calydon warrior's cult.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_07
string.body: Yearling's Shrine;An altar in the south of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_04] dedicated to the Calydon cult of future warriors.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_08
string.body: Disguised Humnaz Outpost;A Reian observation post on the fringes of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_03], disguised beneath a Calydon tent.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B1
string.body: Anaz Forest;A dense, lush forest in the west of Sarpan.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B1_01
string.body: Herbalist's Campsite;A camp convenient for gathering the medicinal plants that grow in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B1_02
string.body: Yocaris' Retreat;The temporary camp of the powerful Reian sorcerer [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Yocios].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B1_05
string.body: Aponos Brohum Village;A Brohum village built on the ruins of many past Brohum civilizations.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B2
string.body: Jotari Wastes;This trecherous desert spreads across northwest Sarpan. It contains many unexplored ruins.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B2_01
string.body: Jotun Research Expedition;The campsite for the Jotun relics excavation team, led by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Linacroft].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B2_02
string.body: Thebadim Altar;This ancient holy site is so badly degraded that it's not clear what it was built in honor of, though the Jotun Research Expedition hopes they'll learn more during its excavation.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B2_03
string.body: Ruined Jotun Watchtower;Ruins in the north Jotari Wastes thoroughly looted by the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_shulak_nightshadowfam].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B2_04
string.body: Ruined Jotun Citadel;These ruins in the east Jotari Wastes have already been looted of artifacts by the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_shulak_nightshadowfam].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B2_05
string.body: Nightshade Camp;The [%dic:STR_DIC_E_shulak_nightshadowfam] camp in these tents.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B2_06
string.body: Hushblade Lookout Camp;A Hushblade Legionary encampment.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B2_07
string.body: Fatebound Lookout Camp;A Fatebound Legionary encampment.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B2_08
string.body: Crumbling Petralith;The remains of a Petralith destroyed by the Balaur. Old stories claim that a Windstream once originated here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B2_09
string.body: Debarim Petralith Studio;A huge Jotun petralith forge in ancient caverns deep beneath the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B2].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B2_10
string.body: Jotari Sanctuary Ruins;An ancient, ruined temple that floats above the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B2_09].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_C1
string.body: Destroyed Guardian's Seal;When the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_guardstone_Q41256] here was destroyed, the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_C1_000] ripped the area into a nightmarish landscape.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_C1_01
string.body: Twisted Land Research Expedition;The Twisted Land Research Group uses this camp as its base while investigating the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_C1_000]. It is in one of the deepest fissures in the Great Fissure.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_C1_02
string.body: Twisted Land Outpost;A temporary camp for the team researching the area annihilated by the Destroyed Guardian's Seal.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_C1_05
string.body: Ellesra Cave;A huge cave brimming with Energy of Greater Aether. Its entrance is hidden in the west of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_C1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_C2
string.body: Satrakand;The ruins of a fortress where remnants of the Satra Legion are encamped.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_C2_01
string.body: Southeast Guardian's Seal;The [%dic:STR_DIC_E_guardstone_Q41256] hre prevents Tiamat's power from destroying the area north of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_C2].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_D
string.body: Sabat's End;A valley that contains the only transport lines from Kamar into Tiamaranta, making it strategically vital. The remains of its namesake are fossilized into the western cliffs of the End.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_D_01
string.body: Hushblade Garrison;A Hushblade Legionary garrison protecting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_D] from Balaur forces.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_D_02
string.body: Fatebound Garrison;A Fatebound Legionary garrison protecting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_D] from Balaur forces.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_D_03
string.body: Sabat's End Cemetary;Tiamat's power has disturbed the spirits resting in this formerly-peaceful Reian cemetary.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_D_04
string.body: Rancora North Gate;The north end of the heavily-fortified Sarpan entrance to Tiamaranta.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_IDLDF4A_Lehpar
string.body: Israphel's Space;A hidden realm private to Empyrean Lord [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Israphel].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_IDLDF4A
string.body: Protector's Realm;A hidden realm conjured by Protector [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Oriatia] as a retreat from the tumultuous Reian world.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B1_08
string.body: Macori Hill;A hill in the Anaz Forest populated by Marconnuts.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T1_A1
string.body: Triumph Gate;The exit of Rancora Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T1_A2
string.body: Adora Desert;A brutal waste of desolate land north of Tiamaranta's Eye.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T1_A3
string.body: Balaur Cavalry Base;A Balaur training base near Rancora Fortress in northeast Tiamaranta, where the Balaur Vasharti Legion train their Pagati.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T1_A4
string.body: Fissure Barrens;A region rent and twisted by the power emanating from the Heart of Fissure. It is pockmarked with craters.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T1_A5
string.body: Fissure's Limits;The northwest corner of Tiamaranta, leading from the Fissure Barrens into the Heart of Fissure.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T1_S1
string.body: Prago Outpost;A Tiamaranta Expeditionary outpost assigned to monitor the Fissure Barrens south of Rancora Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T1_S2
string.body: Adora Supply Base;A depot in the Adora Desert that supplies all Reian forces in Tiamaranta.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T1_S3
string.body: Siege Troop Garrison;;A Tiamaranta Expeditionary garrison for forces laying siege to Tiamaranta's Eye.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T1_S4
string.body: Scout Outpost;;A Reian post overlooking the Balaur Cavalry Base.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T1_S5
string.body: Faultline Research Expedition;Base camp for the team investigating the Fissure Barrens.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T1_S6
string.body: Giant Crater;The largest crater in the Fissure Barrens, at the center of which is an enormous Gap Rift.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T1_S7
string.body: Heart of Fissure Watchpost;A post assigned to monitor the Heart of Fissure.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T2_A1
string.body: Lunatic's Rift;A region in southwest Tiamaranta severely distorted by the power from the Heart of Gravity. It is scattered with Gap and Temporal Rifts.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T2_A2
string.body: Edendell;A mysterious and protected valley in western Tiamaranta. It is populated by unique enchanted creatures.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T2_A3
string.body: Traitor's Hideout;An encampment of Reian traitors north of Edendell.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T2_A4
string.body: Naduka Legion Garrison;The Naduka Legion headquarters on the west side of Tiamaranta's Eye.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T2_A5

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T2_S9

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T3_A1
string.body: Fields of Fire;A region in northeast Tiamaranta diminated by a large active volcano. The region is highly affected by the power from the Heart of Wrath.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T3_A2
string.body: Steam Springs;An area south of the Fields of Fire that features hot springs and volcanic vents.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T3_A3
string.body: Avad Village;An abandoned mining village taken over by Dragonbound. It is southeast of the Steam Springs.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T3_A4
string.body: Basrasa Legion Garrison;The Basrasa Legion headquarters on the east side of Tiamaranta's Eye.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T3_A5
string.body: Wrath's Limits;The northeast corner of Tiamaranta, leading from the Fields of Fire to the Heart of Wrath.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T3_S1
string.body: Cindercone Outpost;A Reian post in the Fields of Fire, in the ruins of a temple built into the side of Mount Wrath.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T3_S2
string.body: Volcanic Research Expedition;Base camp for the team investigating the Fields of Fire.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T3_S3
string.body: Steam Springs Research Expedition;Base camp for the research team assigned to investigate the Steam Springs.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T3_S4
string.body: Mount Wrath;An active volcano that dominates the landscape of northeast Tiamaranta.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T3_S5

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T3_S6
string.body: Heart of Wrath Watchpost;An outpost monitoring the Heart of Wrath.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T4_A1
string.body: Calcified Tundra;A desolate region in southeast Tiamaranta that's affected by proximity to the Heart of Petrification.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T4_A2
string.body: Siel's Temple Ruins;Ruins are all that is left of this grand, dignified temple built by ancient Reians to honor the Empyrean Lady Siel.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T4_A3
string.body: Satra Legion Garrison;The Satra Legion headquarters in the south of Tiamaranta's Eye.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T4_A4
string.body: Petrification's Limits;The southeast corner of Tiamaranta, leading from the Calcified Tundra into the Heart of Petrification.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T4_S1
string.body: Petro Outpost;A Reian legion camp south of Tiamaranta's Eye. It's set up in the ruins of an old fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T4_S2
string.body: Archeological Expedition;Base camp for the Relics Expedition sent to excavate the ruins of the Destroyed Siel Temple.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T4_S3
string.body: Destroyed Siel Temple;All that is left of a grand, dignified temple built by ancient Reians to honor the Empyrean Lady Siel.

string.body: South Eye Guard Post;A Tiamaranta Expeditionary post monitoring the Satra Legion in Tiamaranta's Eye.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T4_S5
string.body: Heart of Petrification Watchpost;A post assigned to monitor the Heart of Petrification.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_C1
string.body: Gurriki Swamp;A swampy valley that winds between the Land of Fissure and the Heart of Wrath Area and is inhabited by a colony of Gurriki.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_C1_A2
string.body: Gurriki Grotto;A cavern deep in the Gurriki Swamp.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_C1_S1
string.body: Gurrik Tree;A tangled tree where Gurriki build their huts.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_C1_S2
string.body: Ioran's Camp;The campsite where Ioran, a Gurriki researcher, compiles her research.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_C1_S3
string.body: Tatar's Hideout;A cavern in the Gurriki Swamp where Tatar hides.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_C2
string.body: Quartz Forest;An icy forest in the south of Tiamaranta.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_C2_A1
string.body: Enos Forest;A frigid forest with dense Enos populations.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_C2_A2
string.body: Blue Quartz Valley;A ravine streaked with veins of brilliant blue quartz.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_C2_A3

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_C2_S1
string.body: Black Cloud Camp;A Black Cloud Trader campsite in the far south of Tiamaranta.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_C2_S2
string.body: Blacksmith's Camp;Campsite of the blacksmith Shumaron, which is convenient to the resources offered by the Lapialus Mineral Veins.

string.body: Basilika Cavern;A gate beneath Tiamaranta's Eye.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_OP

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_OP_A3
string.body: Accord Square;The main central square in Rancora Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_C2_S4
string.body: Ativas Cave;The cave where the giant Ativas Crystalline creature lives.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T1_S11
string.body: Small Crater;Craters scattered around the Fissure Barrens.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T1_S12

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T2_S13

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T3_S9
string.body: Krata's Hideout;The hideout of the Avad Village Dragonbound's leader.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_C2_S5
string.body: Enos Brooding Grounds;A nesting ground in the center of the Enos Forest where the Enos raise their young.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_C2_S6
string.body: Lapialus Mineral Lake;A lake in the Lapialus Mineral Veings. It contains a high concentration of rare minerals that can crystallize items soaked in the waters of the lake.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_C3_S2
string.body: Basilika Passage;The entrance to Basilika Cavern, accessible through the Satra Legion Garrison. You must show the Kunati's Banner to pass through.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T2_S14
string.body: Traitor's House;This would be a good place to set a Marker Stone in the Traitor's Camp.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T2_S15
string.body: Magic's Root;A corner of Edendell where magical powers converge so powerfully that they are palpable.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2_08
string.body: Refugee Waystation;A camp in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2] where refugees can regain their strength, regroup, and attempt to find missing loved ones.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4B_ItemUseArea_Q41558A
string.body: Traitor's House;This would be a good place to set a Marker Stone in the Traitor's Camp.

string.body: Twisted Chasm;A ravine torn through the land beneath the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_C1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_housing_SZ_house_001
string.body: Tezz's House;Tezz is regarded as a tastemaker in Oriel, so her home is open as a design showcase. Tezz is often gone, so Kanen looks after the property.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_housing_DF_house_001
string.body: Tezz's House;Tezz is regarded as a tastemaker in Pernon, so her home is open as a design showcase. Tezz is often gone, so Katenon looks after the property.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_TDown_ItemUseArea_Q12031A
string.body: Shrouded Road;Use the Sounding Gem here to find the path to Tiamat Stronghold.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A09_pvp
string.body: Hero's Discus;A combat ring in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A3_05] that the Urugugu use for training and duels. [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Owllauchief_Nmd_57_Ah]'s power overrides Kahrun's here, and therefore fighting is allowed.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1_05_public1
string.body: Dredgion Incursion Zone 1;An area in the ruins southeast of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1] that comes under attack from the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF4a_Dredgion].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2_09_public2
string.body: Dredgion Incursion Zone 2;An area in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2_04] that comes under attack by the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF4a_Dredgion].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B2_14_public3
string.body: Dredgion Incursion Zone 3;A part of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B2_04] that comes under attack by the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF4a_Dredgion].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_C2_07_public4
string.body: Dredgion Incursion Zone 4;The [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF4a_Dredgion] is moored above this part of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_C2].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_22_a
string.body: Kamar Dungeon Entrance;Located near the northern city walls, this path leads down into the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_12].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_Housing_lf_personal_agora
string.body: Oriel Plaza;This airy plaza in the center of Oriel is always bustling with residents, craftspeople, performers, shoppers and merchants.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_Housing_df_personal_agora
string.body: Pernon Plaza;This airy plaza in the center of Pernon is always bustling with residents, craftspeople, performers, shoppers and merchants.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_Reward_SZ_keynamedroom

string.body: Discard Pile;A space for stacking low-grade relics inside the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_ZONE_NAME_IDTiamat_Reward].

string.body: Guardian Artifact Control Room;A space for controlling the guarding artifact that is watching the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_ZONE_NAME_IDTiamat_Reward].'

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_Reward_SZ_Finalnamedroom
string.body: War Chest;A space filled with Satra Legion's war funds. Giniurash, a violent dragon, is guarding the site.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_R1
string.body: Tiamat Stronghold;Key forces of the Tiamat Legion have been gathered here. It is accessible through the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_1_FOBJ_Entrance] located North of Tiamaranta's Eye.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_R2
string.body: Stronghold Corridor;A long passage that leads from the entrance of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_R1] to its inner gate.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_R3
string.body: Stronghold Inner Gate;The final defense against intruders attacking [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_R1]. [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDTiamat_DrakanGuardian_Named_60_Ah] guards this gate

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S1
string.body: Glorious Nexus;The central area inside the Tiamat Stronghold. It connects all of the stronghold's wings together. A [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_FOBJ_Teleport_S6] is at the center, its purpose unknown.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S2
string.body: Engineering Lab;A research laboratory inside the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_R1]. Human experiments are performed here using Drana.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S2_1
string.body: Hewahewa's Lab;A laboratory where [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDTiamat_ShulackScientist_60_Ae] works.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S3
string.body: Dredgion Control Center;Control center inside the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_R1] that handles both the Chantra and Terath Dredgions.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S3_1
string.body: Gravity Control Lab;A place inside the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_R1] where [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDTiamat_Chantra_Named_60_Ah] is experimenting with gravity manipulation.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S3_2
string.body: Dredgion Command Center;[%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDTiamat_Sardha_Named_60_Ah] commands the Dredgion from here. It is located within the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_R1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S4
string.body: Military Ward;The central hub for military operations inside the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_R1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S4_1
string.body: Eternal Prison;A prison camp inside the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_R1]. Vicious criminals and traitors are kept here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S4_2
string.body: Repentance Chamber;An isolated cell within the Eternal Prison.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S4_3
string.body: Laksyaka Legion HQ;[%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDTiamat_Rakshaka_Named_60_Ah] orders her troops from here. It is part of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_R1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S5
string.body: Savage Gauntlet;It is inside the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_R1] and connects to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S5_1
string.body: Tahabata Legion HQ;[%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDTiamat_Tahabata_Named_60_Ah] orders her troops from here. It is situated in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_R1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S6
string.body: Noble Garden;A Dragon Lord's secret garden spot. It is accessible through the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_FOBJ_Teleport_S6] located in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S6_1
string.body: The Gallery of Heroes;A place found inside the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_S6]. Vendors of vital battlefield equipment keep stores here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_T1
string.body: Dragon Lord's Refuge;One of Dragon Lord Tiamat domiciles. It is accessible through the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_2_FOBJ_Entrance] at Tiamaranta's Eye.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_T6
string.body: Throne of Blood;It is reachable through the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDTiamat_solo_entrance_L] generated inside Tiamaranta's Eye.

string.body: Elyos Breakout;An Elyos outpost inside Tiamaranta's Eye.

string.body: Asmodian Breakout;An Asmodian outpost inside Tiamaranta's Eye.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_T6_D
string.body: Throne of Blood;It is reachable through the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDTiamat_solo_entrance_D] generated inside Tiamaranta's Eye.

string.body: Nochsana Training Camp;A Balaur training camp in the Abyss, accessible through the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_AB1_Corridor_Q3702] or [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LF2_Rogun].

string.body: Nochsana Training Camp;A Balaur training camp in the Abyss, accessible through the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_AB1_Corridor_Q4702] or [%dic:STR_DIC_N_DF2_Barlack].

string.body: Spiral Corridor;Spiral Corridor

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDUnderpassRe_SZ
string.body: The Hexway;Located to the north of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_Underpass]. Brigade General Laksyaka hid relics here for the traitors.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5b_TD
string.body: The Eternal Bastion;A mountain fortress built by the ancient Danuar. Until recently, it was occupied by the Beritra Legion.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDDF2flying_event01
string.body: Shugo Imperial Tomb;Greedy Kobalds, Krall and Strigiks have recently been found furiously digging up graves. You can get to the tomb by speaking to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDEvent01_In_NPC].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDDF2flying_event01_Room
string.body: Treasure Room;A room filled with treasures from the Ancient Shugo Empire. You can enter only by placing one of the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_MAP_TOTAL] on the Imperial Shrine.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_E2
string.body: Goldrine Village;The southernmost village in the Goldrine Free City. It is a favorite hangout of Shulack pirates.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDShulackShip_02_SZ_1F
string.body: Steel Rose Cargo;The pier for the Steel Rose, a giant pirate ship captained by Rumakiki. Elyos can enter through [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDShulack_Rose_Ent_1F_E], and Asmodians through [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDShulack_Rose_Ent_1FD_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDShulackShip_02_SZ_2F
string.body: Steel Rose Quarters;The cabin of the Steel Rose, a giant pirate ship captained by Rumakiki. Elyos can enter through [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDShulack_Rose_Ent_2F_E], and Asmodians through [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDShulack_Rose_Ent_2FD_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDShulackShip_02_SZ_3F
string.body: Steel Rose Deck;The deck of the Steel Rose, a giant pirate ship captained by Rumakiki. Elyos can enter through [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDShulack_Rose_Ent_3F_E], and Asmodians through [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDShulack_Rose_Ent_3FD_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDShulackShip_02
string.body: Steel Rose;A giant pirate ship captained by Rumakiki. It is anchored somewhere in Danaria.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_A1
string.body: Frozen Plateau;An exceptionally cold plateau west of the Eremion Bulwark in Danaria.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_A1_CV
string.body: Crystal Cave;A cave located between [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_A1] and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_A2].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_A2
string.body: Danaria Gate;A gateway that connects Danaria to Katalam.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_A3
string.body: Weeping Snowfield;A snow-covered mountain pass located east of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_A2]. The ruins of an ancient Danuar and Jotun city dot the landscape.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_A4
string.body: Sleeping Elders Plateau;A frozen lake located south of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_A2]. Novun wander the lake, and an entire army is rumored to be frozen beneath it.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_B1
string.body: Redfang Territory;An area occupied by the Asmodian Redfang Guerillas, who are commanded by Faun. Their territory borders the Tainted Lands.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_B2

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_B3
string.body: Tiamat's Fall;The Beritra Army annihilated the Tiamat Legion during a massive battle in this area. A few Tiamat Legion survivors still wander the fields.

string.body: Infinity Shard;A hangar, located in Idian Depths, where the Danuar Hyperion is stored.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E1_QUEST
string.body: Sillus Fortress Pathway;An access route leading to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_SV_5011] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E1_E2]. The road meanders along high ridges.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E2_QUEST
string.body: Chillbreeze Valley;A valley found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E1_E2] with a pathway to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_SV_5011].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_D1_1
string.body: Silona Fountainhead;An area in northern [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_D1] with a pathway leading to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_G1]. There are pools created by a great Ide explosion.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_D1_2
string.body: Drained Basin;An area in southern [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_D1] connected to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_D2] via a cave.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_D2_2

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_D2_3

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_F4_2

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_F4_3

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDASTERIA_IU_WORLD_01
string.body: The Nightmare Circus;An army of manifested nightmares led by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDASTERIA_WORLD_NMD_03]. They are trying to invade Atreia using Yume's power.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_Tiamat_Down
string.body: Tiamaranta's Eye;The innermost part of Tiamaranta. Tiamat Stronghold floats in the sky above it.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_IDLDF5_Under_03
string.body: Illuminary Obelisk;A structure built to house the shielding mechanism for Katalam, it is a vital strategic point in the war against Beritra. Reachable from the vicinity of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDF5_U3_FOBJ_Entrance] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_IDLDF5_Under_03_SZ_S1
string.body: Barrier Chamber;A chamber at the very top of the Illuminary Obelisk. Charge the four Power Generators in the Illuminary Obelisk to activate the protective shield in this room.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5b_TD_War
string.body: Iron Wall Warfront;Located in Danaria, it is currently occupied by the Beritra Army led by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF5_TD_War_Vri_Boss_65_Al].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Up3_Crotan_02
string.body: Hidden Krotan Barracks; The Balaurs' hidden warehouse that can be accessed from [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_33]. You may enter this area by talking to the Barracks Entrance Support Officer inside the fortress after reaching a level 6 landing reinforcement and occupying [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_33].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Up3_Dkisas_02
string.body: Hidden Kysis Barracks; The Balaurs' hidden warehouse that can be accessed from [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_37]. You may enter this area by talking to the Barracks Entrance Support Officer inside the fortress after reaching a level 6 landing reinforcement and occupying [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_37].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Up3_Lamiren_02
string.body: Hidden Miren Barracks; The Balaurs' hidden warehouse that can be accessed from [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_30]. You may enter this area by talking to the Barracks Entrance Support Officer inside the fortress after reaching a level 6 landing reinforcement and occupying [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_30].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF4_SensoryArea_Q24062a
string.body: Ancillary Observatory;A post for observing the entrance to the Silentera Canyon in Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SensoryArea_Q14081
string.body: Petrified Core;The Center of the Heart of Petrification, one of the Dragon Lord Tiamat's bases in Tiamaranta.

string.name: STR_DIC_LF4_SensoryArea_Q14062
string.body: Ancillary Camp;A Balaur guard post located at the entrance of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_Underpass].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDKamar
string.body: Kamar Battlefield;A battlefield for 12 on 12 battles. Since Kahrun's gone missing, Kamar has turned into a devastated war zone due to the Balaur invasion.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDArena_Glory
string.body: Arena of Glory;A new arena in the Crucible Coliseum. This arena is designed for four contestants, all contestants with high ranks at the Arena of Discipline and the Arena of Harmony.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5_Under_01_War
string.body: Engulfed Ophidan Bridge;A battlefield for 6 on 6 battles. The Elyos and Asmodians wage intense battle over this area, as it is a key point to invading Beritra's territory.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF1_ItemUseArea_Q24031
string.body: Ishalgen Abyss Gate Area;The area where the hidden Abyss Gate of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA193] is located. Use [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_24031a] to investigate this area.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF1A_ItemUseArea_Q24031
string.body: Altgard Abyss Gate Area;The area where the hidden Abyss Gate of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_31] is located. Use [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_24031b] to investigate this area.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF2_ItemUseArea_Q24031
string.body: Morheim Abyss Gate Area;The area where the hidden Abyss Gate of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_E4_3] is located. Use [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_24031c] to investigate this area.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Up3_Dkisas_02_N
string.body: Kysis Barracks;The Balaur fortress in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_32]. It is currently guarded by the Ereshkigal Legion, having joined the Beritra Army. You may enter this area if your allies occupy [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_33].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Up3_Lamiren_02_N
string.body: Miren Barracks;The Balaur fortress in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_36]. It is currently guarded by the Ereshkigal Legion, having joined the Beritra Army. You may enter this area if your allies occupy [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_37].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Up3_Crotan_02_N
string.body: Krotan Barracks;The Balaur fortress in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_32]. It is currently occupied by the Ereshkigal Legion, having joined the Beritra Army. Only legions that hold [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_33] may enter this area through the Legion entrance manager.

string.body: Aetherbrak;An area in which Tiamat built an Aetheric Field to seal Levinshor [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_OP_L].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_B_01
string.body: The Old Road;An ancient supply route in the north of Levinshor. It is presumed to have been built by the Tiamat Army.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_C_01
string.body: Tidewash Cove;A cave at the eastern end of the Levinshor Coast.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_D_01
string.body: Lobneru Lagoon;Home to the Tomul in northeastern Levinshor.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_E_01
string.body: Lawbringer's Cut;The main route that the Elger Expedition uses to advance into [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_K_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_F_01
string.body: Stonepike Falls;A symbolic region representing the abundant water resources of Levinshor. Water flows through a waterfall to form this fountainhead. [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_OP_D] is located there.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_G_01
string.body: Twilight Underwood;A valley in southern Levinshor that is home to a number of the Beritra Army's invasion bases.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_H_01
string.body: Whisperleaf Forest;A quiet forest in the western area of Levinshor. Unlike other forests in Balaurea, it features beautiful lush vegetation.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_I_01
string.body: Moon Thicket;A region near [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_H_01] and home to the Denku, who venerate the Balaur.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_J_01
string.body: Valpura Heights;A highland in east of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_K_01]. It is a major crossroads to various regions.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_K_01
string.body: Flameberth Downs;A basin in Levinshor's center that is heavily guarded by Balaur forces. Rumored to be Tiamat's birthplace.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_OP_L
string.body: Lumewillow Glade;An Elyos base held by Bonesinger Legionnaires in Levinshor.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_OP_D
string.body: Pinnacle Cataracts;An Asmodian base held by Darkfate Legionnaires in Levinshor.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress
string.body: Kaldor;An area discovered in Katalam. It used to hold the main fortresses of the Danuar. The aftermath of a massive explosion has forever scarred the land.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A1_v01
string.body: Stonereach Outpost;A capturable base in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A1].

string.body: Shatterbark Woods;A forest in the north of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress]. This area received relatively little damage from the Explosion.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A1_Start
string.body: Rubirinerk's Settlement;A settlement area in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A1] of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress]. The Rubirinerk Union has taken control of this area for business purposes and will quarter no aggression.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A2
string.body: Splitwood;A forest in southern [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress]. This area received relatively little damage from the Explosion.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A2_Start
string.body: Saparinerk's Settlement;A settlement area in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A2] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress]. The Saparinerk League has taken control of this area for business purposes and will quarter no aggression.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A3
string.body: Emberpine Pass;An intersection in the middle of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A1] and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A2]. It leads to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_B1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A3_Named
string.body: Stillness Hollow;A cave located in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A3]. The Tiamat Remnants are stationed here.

string.body: Stonereach Outpost Chariot Depot;A depot that stores the chariots of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A1_v01]. It is located in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A3].

string.body: Valiant's Watch;A sloping area connected to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A4].

string.body: Stonegrave Ruins;Danuar ruins connected to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A5]. It contains the remains of stone statues from the peak of Danuar prosperity.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance
string.body: Levinshor;Tiamat's home and where the Dragon Lord is rumored to have gathered her main force. Levinshor is now occupied by Beritra's forces as an ideal launching point for his own invasion.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_Arena_clobby
string.body: Wisplight Abbey;A sanctuary built by the Academy to support returning Daevas. It can be reached via [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_Arena_L_clobby_Entrance_In] in Sanctum or by using an Abbey Return Stone.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_Arena_clobby_D
string.body: Fatebound Abbey;A sanctuary built by the Priory to support returning Daevas. It can be reached via [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_Arena_D_clobby_Entrance_In] in Pandaemonium or by using an Abbey Return Stone.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SensoryArea_Q20501a
string.body: Dreg Findspot;The location where ancient civilization scholar Nixie discovered ancient pieces of a ruin.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SensoryArea_Q20503a
string.body: Aetheric Field Site;The site where the newly discovered Aetheric Field Stone is located.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SensoryArea_Q20506a
string.body: Mindboggle Waste;The area where the missing searchers were carrying out the last mission.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SensoryArea_Q20507a
string.body: Mysterious Cave;A cave where a frigid aetheric enegy can be detected.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF4_Underpass_door
string.body: Inggison Silentera Canyon Corridor;An entrance to the Silentera Canyon located in the Angrief Ruins in Inggison.

string.name: STR_DIC_IDSweep
string.body: The Shugo Emperor's Vault;A vault filled with the treasures that belonged to an ancient Shugo emperor. It has been taken over by a pack of intruders made up of Kobolds, Shulacks, and Balaur. Seek out [%dic:STR_DIC_NPC_IDSweep_IN_NPC01] for a way into the vault.

string.name: STR_DIC_IDSweep_Room01
string.body: Suspicious Evidence;Intruders left traces of digging a tunnel to enter [%dic:STR_DIC_IDSweep]. It is guarded by Ruthless Jabaraki.

string.name: STR_DIC_IDSweep_Room02
string.body: The Golden Gateway;The entrance of an ancient Shugo emperor's vault. It is guarded by Watchman Hokuruki.

string.name: STR_DIC_IDSweep_Room03
string.body: The Shugo Emperor's Vault;A vault filled with enormous treasures that belonged to an ancient Shugo Emperor. Since the Emperor's passing, the vault has been used to store massive amounts of Kinah as well.

string.name: STR_DIC_IDSweep_Room04
string.body: Trillirunerk's Prized Coffers;An inner vault where ancient Shugo relics are hidden.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5
string.body: Cygnea;A land that rose up in place of the three continents that sunk to the bottom of the ocean following Beritra's Invasion. The Aequis Expedition has been dispatched to investigate.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_A_01
string.body: Saphic Bog;The first region discovered by the Aequis Expedition that has been dispatched to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5]. The headquarters of the expedition is established here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_B_01
string.body: Crimson Hills;An area of red sand and coral hills located in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_C_01
string.body: Northern Crimson Hills;An area located in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5]. Here you can find [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_Village_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_D_01
string.body: Dragon Lord's Outer Garden;A Dragon Lord's garden located in the north of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5]. Here you can find [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_OP_02].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_E_01
string.body: Dragon Lord's Centerpiece;A central garden shrine of the Dragon Lords located in the center of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_F_01
string.body: Twilight Temple;A temple built in the center of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5] to exalt the power of the Dragon Lords. It is currently in ruins.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_H_01
string.body: Perennial Mosswood;The highlands located in the southwestern region of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5]. The area is abundant in great ancient moss.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_I_01
string.body: Wiltfog Briar; A dark forest at the southwestern end of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5]. The forest is so dense with trees that the inside of the forest is pitch-black even during daytime.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_J_01
string.body: Wailing Dunes;A desert located in the northwestern part of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_K_01
string.body: Howling Cauldron;A lava valley at the northeastern end of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5]. The entrance to Drakenspire Depths is located here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_P1_01
string.body: Black Fin Canyon;A sheer and rough canyon in the northwestern region of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5]. A village of the Black Fin tribe is inside the canyon.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_P2_01
string.body: Frostshard Cavern;An area located in the center of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5]. Freezing winds constantly sweep this area.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_OP_01
string.body: Aequis Headquarters;The headquarters of the Aequis Expedition, established at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_A_01] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_OP_02
string.body: Aequis Advance Post;An expeditionary base of the Aequis Expedition established at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_D_01] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_OP_03
string.body: Aequis Outpost;An advance base of the Aequis Expedition established at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_H_01] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_Village_01
string.body: Nixkaion Campsite;Located at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_C_01]. Here Archaeologist Nixkaion is leading the research on the lifestyle and culture of Cygnia.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_Village_02
string.body: Dragon Lord's Ruins;Located at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_E_01]. Although Tiamat is dead, Beritra's remnants are still fighting here to obtain Tiamat's power.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_Village_03
string.body: War Supply Depot;Located at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_F_01]. Hidden by a high canyon, it is a perfect place to store supplies safely.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_Village_04
string.body: Aequis Detachment Post;An advance base of the Aequis Expedition established at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_J_01] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_ID_01
string.body: Sky Fortress Operation Post;A post built after the discovery of a corridor leading to Aturam Sky Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_ID_02
string.body: Reian Refugee Camp;A place built by the Reians when they discovered an entrance to Rentus Base after their arrival in Cygnea.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_ID_03
string.body: Ruinhold Scatterings;A place where a relic connected to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_R1] and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_T1] was discovered.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_ID_04
string.body: Raksang Ruins Entrance;An entrance to Raksang Ruins.

string.body: Ophidan Bridge Entrance;An entrance to Ophidan Bridge.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_ID_06
string.body: Danuar Sanctuary Entrance;An entrance to the Danuar Sanctuary.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5
string.body: Enshar;A land that rose up in place of the three continents that sunk to the bottom of the ocean following Beritra's Invasion.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_C_Shark
string.body: Black Fin Village;A village of the Black Fin tribe located in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_C_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_C_Shark_Fresco
string.body: Unusual Mural;A mural found inside [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_C_Shark].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_A_01
string.body: Pentachroma Coast;The region where the expedition first made landfall. It is where the exploration of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF5] begins.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_B_01
string.body: Washrun Stretch;A region where sea debris remains.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_C_01
string.body: Broken Highlands;A hilly area where the fossil of a gigantic Scolite can be found.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_D_01
string.body: Aurelian Timbers;A beautiful forest where a golden sunset shines through the leaves.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_E_01
string.body: Moontide Dive;A valley where huge moonlight-colored jellyfish live.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_F_01
string.body: Bonecreak Valley;A valley where large ancient fossils are found.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_G_01
string.body: Scalefang Dale;A valley where an altar of the Balaur from ancient times has been found.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_H_01
string.body: The Sanguisands;The northern part of a desert filled with Red Coral. The flow of sand here resembles blood.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_H_02
string.body: The Blood Grains;The southern part of a desert filled with Red Coral. The flow of sand here resembles blood.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_I_01
string.body: Leviathan's Ruin;A region where the ruins of an ancient gigantic civilization are located.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_J_01
string.body: Wyrmcast Lands;A wasteland where countless remains of the Balaur can be found.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_K_01
string.body: Shriekfang Crown;A place where it is rumored Ereshkigal's screams can be heard.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_P1_01
string.body: Cloudtalon Valley;A valley inhabited by the Tejhi, named after an ancient ritualistic artifact, now lost to time and legend.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_P2_01
string.body: Wavehollow Brink;A sea of abyssal depth. The sea emanates frigid energy.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_OP_01
string.body: Forgotten Temple of Dragon Lord; A temple built a long time ago by a dragon that became a Dragon Lord. The expedition established its first base here after arriving at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF5].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_OP_02
string.body: Dawnbreak Temple;A temple in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_D_01] where the expedition established a base.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_OP_03
string.body: Whirlpool Temple;A temple in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_H_02] where the expedition established a base.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_Village_01
string.body: Walqule Campsie;Walqule's campsite. It is under direct control of Support Corps Captain Walqule.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_Village_02
string.body: Dragon Lord's Ruins Site;Although Tiamat is dead, Beritra's remnants are still fighting here to obtain Tiamat's power.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_Village_03
string.body: War Supply Depot;A supply depot under the command of Support Corps Captain Cnute. It is a perfect place to store supplies safely.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_Village_04
string.body: Fatebound Legion Advance Area;An advance area of the Fatebound Legion in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_J_01]. It is under the direct command of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_DF5_Vard_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_E_02
string.body: Lunashin Cave;A large cave lit by the moonlight.

string.body: Sky Fortress Insurgent Post;A place where an Invasion Corridor that enables infiltration into [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDStation_SZ_Station] was discovered.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_ID_02
string.body: Rentus Recovery Base;A place where an Invasion Corridor leading to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_IDYun] was discovered. The Yuns built a base here to recover Rentus Base at all costs.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_ID_03
string.body: Dragonfall's Glare;A place where a relic connected to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_R1] and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_T1] was discovered.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_ID_04
string.body: Raksang Ruins Infiltration Area;A place where an Invasion Corridor that enables infiltration into Raksang Ruins was discovered.

string.body: Perkin Pursuit Area;A place where an Invasion Corridor that enables pursuit of Perkin in Ophidan Bridge was discovered.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_ID_06
string.body: Danuar Sanctuary Investigation Area;A place where an Invasion Corridor that enables entry to the Danuar Sanctuary was discovered.

string.body: Uncharted Cave;A cave that emanates the cold energy discovered by the Tejhi Trackers.

string.body: Guardian Stone Site;Location where the activated Tiamat's Guardian Stone was discovered.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_2_F5_FOBJ_Entrance
string.body: Anguished Dragon Lord's Refuge;An abode of Dragon Lord Tiamat in the enemy camp. The Elyos may enter it through [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDTiamat_2_F5_FOBJ_Entrance_Dark], and the Asmodians through [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDTiamat_2_F5_FOBJ_Entrance].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDSeal
string.body: Drakenspire Depths;A prohibited sanctum in Balaur language, where Dragon Lord Ereshkigal was sealed by Fregion. Daevas may enter through [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDSeal_Entrance_v60].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DC2_SZ_01
string.body: Dark Empyrean Shelter;A place where the Empyrean Lords rest. Only Daevas with Agent Skuldon's permission can go here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF4
string.body: Inggison;A region located in the south of Balaurea, where Empyrean Lord Kaisinel built an Illusion Fortress to prepare for the advance into Balaurea.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF4
string.body: Gelkmaros;Empyrean Lord Marchutan has seized this area in Balaurea to keep Tiamat in check. At the center is Silentera Corridor, which connects to Inggison.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LC1
string.body: Sanctum;The main city of Elysea, known for major landmarks like the Great Holy Shrine, Elyos Square, and Protectors Hall. It was built to inspire and unite the Elyos after the Cataclysm.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6
string.body: Iluma;A land near the Tower of Eternity in Elysea. Empyrean Lord Ariel's Sanctuary can be found here, as well as creatures from before the Cataclysm.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_OP
string.body: Ariel's Sanctuary;An Elyos base in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_OP_Square
string.body: Eternal Pool; The central square of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_OP]. It contains a massive fragment from the Tower of Eternity.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_OP_Mainroom
string.body: Throne of Ariel;The Elyos headquarters located at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_OP_Square].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6
string.body: Norsvold;The surrounding lands at the base of the Tower of Eternity in Asmodae, home to Empyrean Lord Azphel's Sanctuary. The power of the Aetheric Field slows the flow of time here; ancient creatures and plants make the land a dim reflection of life before the Cataclysm.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_OP
string.body: Azphel's Sanctuary;An Asmodian base in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6] built on the site of a great shrine.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_OP_Square
string.body: Sanctuary Courtyard; A square found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_OP] built around a massive fragment of the Tower of Eternity.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_OP_Mainroom
string.body: Temple of Darkness;The Asmodian headquarters located near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_OP_Square].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_A1
string.body: The Illumined Pergolas; An area located in the center of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6]. Considered a holy place before the Cataclysm due to the presence of Empyrean Lord Ariel's Sanctuary.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_A2
string.body: Ellosim Garden; An area located in the center of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6]. It once belonged to the Empyrean Lord of Light, Ariel.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_B1
string.body: Valley of the Wayward; A valley located in the southeastern region of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_B2
string.body: Jotun Graveyard; A coast that stretches along the southeastern region of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6]. It is located at the end of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_B1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_C
string.body: Polten Marsh; A marshland in the south of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6]. A type of plant that is invaluable for medical study grows in this region.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_D
string.body: Black Gale Pass; A valley located in the southwestern region of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6]. It is known as a habitat of ancient Sapiens.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_E
string.body: Ariel's Rest; A forest in the west of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6]. An altar for Empyrean Lord Ariel was said to be found here before the Cataclysm.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_F1
string.body: Fallow Ruins; A forest in the northwest of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6]. Despite the ruins, the forest is said to be fertile, thanks to many fragments of the Tower of Eternity found throughout.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_F2
string.body: The Aetherion; An ancient ruins located in the northwest of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6]. It is said that the Aether in the ruins glows with light at night, filling the temple with power.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_G
string.body: Zephyr Vale; A plateau located in the north of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6]. The power of Aether in the plateau sometimes surges, making flight possible.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_H1
string.body: Tarha Aether Mine; An area in the northeast of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6]. It is a mine where an ancient tribe of Kralls extract Aether.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_H2
string.body: Tarha Krall Village; An area in the northeast of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6]. It is inhabited by a tribe of ancient Kralls.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_I
string.body: Kojol Valley; A region in the east of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6]. An excessive supply of Aether left this canyon flourishing with large and exuberant life forms.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_A1_BF1
string.body: Othia Fragment Exploration Area; An area where a massive fragment of the Tower of Eternity is found. The Hymn of Aion Legion are investigating the fragment in this area.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_A1_BF2
string.body: Candellus Fragment Exploration Area; An area where a massive fragment of the Tower of Eternity is found. The Hymn of Aion Legion are investigating the fragment in this area.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_A2_BF3
string.body: Philos Fragment Exploration Area; An area where a massive fragment of the Tower of Eternity is found. The Hymn of Aion Legion are investigating the fragment in this area.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_A2_BF4
string.body: Anemos Fragment Exploration Area; An area where a massive fragment of the Tower of Eternity is found. The Hymn of Aion Legion are investigating the fragment in this area.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_D_Ship
string.body: Elyos Defense Frigate; An Elyos ship of defense (Not Used)

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_L_Ship
string.body: Archon's Shadow Warship; An Archon combat ship invading Iluma. When the ship attacks, a windstream forms near [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LF6_OP_Event_B_In] and becomes accessible for travel.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_B1_M_Event
string.body: Sky Island of the Valley of the Lost; A sky island floating in the sky above the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_B1]. It can be reached by using the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LF6_B1_Event_N_In].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_B2_M_Event
string.body: Sky Island of the Coast of the Light-Deprived; A sky island floating in the sky above the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_B2]. It can be reached by using the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LF6_B1_Event_N_In].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_C_M_Event
string.body: Sky Island of the Polten Marsh; A sky island floating in the sky above the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_C]. It can be reached by using the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LF6_B1_Event_N_In].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_D_M_Event
string.body: Sky Island of Black Wind Valley; A sky island floating in the sky above [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_D]. It can be reached by using the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LF6_B1_Event_N_In].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_E_M_Event
string.body: Sky Island of the Serene Forest of Spirits; A sky island floating in the sky above the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_E]. It can be reached by using the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LF6_B1_Event_N_In].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_F1_M_Event
string.body: Sky Island of the Forest of Dormant Life; A sky island floating in the sky above the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_F1]. It can be reached by using the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LF6_B1_Event_N_In].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_F2_M_Event
string.body: Sky Island of the Ancient Temple of Life; A sky island floating in the sky above the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_F2]. It can be reached by using the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LF6_B1_Event_N_In].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_G_M_Event
string.body: Sky Island of the Plateau of Zephyr; A sky island floating in the sky above the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_G]. It can be reached by using the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LF6_B1_Event_N_In].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_H_M_Event
string.body: Sky Island of Krall Aether Mine; A sky island floating in the sky above [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_H1]. It can be reached by using the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LF6_B1_Event_N_In].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_I_M_Event
string.body: Sky Island of Red Mushroom Valley; A sky island floating in the sky above [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_I]. It can be reached by using the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LF6_B1_Event_N_In].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_A1
string.body: Morninglight Plains; An area located in the center of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6]. Its proximity to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_OP] keeps the whole area in a perpetual state of springtime.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_A2
string.body: Tranquil Fens;A marsh fed by [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_G] to the north. Travelers in the fens are filled with a sense of serenity and rejuvenation.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_B1
string.body: Featherfern Jungle; A primordial jungle in the southwest of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6]. The creatures here blur the lines between plants and animals.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_B2
string.body: Anima's Haunt; An area in the southwest corner of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6], only reachable by traveling through [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_B1]. It was once the territory of a powerful creature who was friend to the Empyrean Lords; its spirit is said to haunt the area now.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_C
string.body: Canyon of Lost Souls; A region in the south of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6]. The plants here have a strange energy about them that some monsters seem to feed off of.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_D
string.body: Calydon Canyon; A series of mesas and valleys in the southeast corner of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6]. It is home to the Calydon, a race of intelligent but primitive creatures.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_E
string.body: Plateau of Aetheric Gales; A region to the east of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6]. The Aetheric field waxes and wanes on the plateau, occasionally allowing deava to fly.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_F1
string.body: Azurelight Forest; A forest directly north of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_OP]. The land is rich with crystalized aether deposits, imbuing the plants and animals of this region with life energy.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_F2
string.body: Ruins of Ancient Echoes; A haunted city in the northeast section of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6]. The aetheric field thins time here, and at night the memories of the past glow and come to life, or a pale imitation of it.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_G
string.body: Aetherspring Lake; A serene body of water to the north of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6]. It is rumored to be a source of the fluctuations in the aetheric field, and many consider it to be a holy place.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_H1
string.body: Black Mane Mountains; A mountain range in northwest [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6]. Here live a tribe of Mau cut off from their cousins for generations, as well as a tribe of Skurvs.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_H2
string.body: Zenzen Tribal Grounds; A region in the northwest of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6]. It is home to a primitive tribe of Skurvs who call themselves the Zenzen.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_I
string.body: Nightbloom Forest; A region in the west of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6]. This beautiful and mysterious forest errupts into fields of red flowers every night.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_A1_BF1
string.body: Northern Morninglight Fragment Excavation; A camp set up by the Archon's Shadow Legion to investigate a fragment of the shattered Tower of Eternity.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_A1_BF2
string.body: Southern Morninglight Fragment Excavation; A camp set up by the Archon's Shadow Legion to investigate a fragment of the shattered Tower of Eternity.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_A2_BF3
string.body: Northern Tranquility Fragment Excavation; A camp set up by the Archon's Shadow Legion to investigate a fragment of the shattered Tower of Eternity.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_A2_BF4
string.body: Southern Tranquility Fragment Excavation; A camp set up by the Archon's Shadow Legion to investigate a fragment of the shattered Tower of Eternity.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_D_Ship
string.body: Asmodian Medium Defense Frigate; An Asmodian ship of defense.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_L_Ship
string.body: Hymn of Aion Warship; A Guardian airship invading Norsvold. When the ship attacks, a windstream forms near [%dic:STR_DIC_N_DF6_OP_Event_B_In] allowing you to reach the ship.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_B1_M_Event
string.body: Sky Island of Feather Bough Forest; A sky island floating in the sky above the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_B1]. It can be reached by using the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LF6_B1_Event_N_In].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_B2_M_Event
string.body: Sky Island of the Territory of Spiritus; A sky island floating in the sky above the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_B2]. It can be reached by using the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LF6_B1_Event_N_In].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_C_M_Event
string.body: Sky Island of the Cursed Canyon; A sky island floating in the sky above the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_C]. It can be reached by using the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LF6_B1_Event_N_In].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_D_M_Event
string.body: Sky Island of Kalidag Canyon; A sky island floating in the sky above [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_D]. It can be reached by using the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LF6_B1_Event_N_In].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_E_M_Event
string.body: Sky Island of the Plateau of Judgment; A sky island floating in the sky above the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_E]. It can be reached by using the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LF6_B1_Event_N_In].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_F1_M_Event
string.body: Sky Island of Blue Illusion Forest; A sky island floating in the sky above [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_F1]. It can be reached by using the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LF6_B1_Event_N_In].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_F2_M_Event
string.body: Sky Island of the Ruins of Lost Time; A sky island floating in the sky above the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_F2]. It can be reached by using the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LF6_B1_Event_N_In].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_G_M_Event
string.body: Sky Island of the Lake of Life; A sky island floating in the sky above the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_G]. It can be reached by using the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LF6_B1_Event_N_In].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_H_M_Event
string.body: Sky Island of the Black Mane Mountains; A sky island floating in the sky above the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_H1]. It can be reached by using the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LF6_B1_Event_N_In].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_I_M_Event
string.body: Sky Island of Saphora Forest; A sky island floating in the sky above [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_I]. It can be reached by using the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LF6_B1_Event_N_In].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF_Tower
string.body: Tower of Eternity;A colossal tower at the center of Atreia. It can be reached via a fragment of the tower in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6] or [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF_Tower
string.body: Tower of Eternity;A colossal tower at the center of the world that once connected Elysea and Asmodae. It can be reached through one of the shattered tower fragments in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDEternity_01
string.body: Archives of Eternity; An area that can be reached through the Artifact of Knowledge inside the Tower of Eternity. It contains records of all knowledge from the beginning of time.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_LF6_SZ_B1_Cave
string.body: Lost Cove; A pirate hideout in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_B1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_B1_Qspot
string.body: Valley of the Wayward Scout Post; An Elyos scout post located in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_B1].

string.body: Jotun Graveyard Scout Post; An Elyos scout post located in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_B2].

string.body: Featherfern Jungle Scout Post; An Asmodian scout post located in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_B1], manned by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_DF6_Bither_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_B2_Qspot

string.body: Volar Gantlet; A small floating island in the sky above the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_G].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_G_Wing
string.body: Hall of Zephyr; A floating island in the sky above the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_G].
