string.body: Eternal Pool; A vast pool in the center of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_OP].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_LF6_SZ_F2_square
string.body: Court of Auronos; A vast plaza in the center of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_F2].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_I_Cave
string.body: Basedes Canyon; A canyon in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_I] where black mushrooms grow. A terrible stench surrounds the valley.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SensoryArea_Q15613a
string.body: Promised Rendezvous Point; A place to rendezvous with [%dic:STR_DIC_N_DF6_Schedar_E], who has infiltrated [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_E_FloatingSquare
string.body: Fate of Prometheus; A horrid platform floating above the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_E]. It is rumored to be the prison of a daeva.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_E_Square
string.body: Tortured Plain; A disturbing construct in eastern [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_E] that remebles someone's nightmare vision of hell.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_F2_Garden
string.body: Reflection Pool; An old fountain and garden that exist in a place where time runs strangely. It can be seen in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_F2].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_B2_Sanctum
string.body: Anima's Nest; The place where Animus once laid its eggs in hopes of raising young, ub [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_B2].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_B2_Named
string.body: Anima's Perch; A favored resting place of Animus in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_B2]. [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF6_B2_24_Named_Birdmom_70_Al] will often return here, seeking an unatainable peace.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_C_Deepwood
string.body: Heartsblood Copse; A dark and secluded patch of forest located deep within [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_C]. It is a place imbued with a great and primordial power.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_G_Lake
string.body: Aetherspring Oak; A gigantic tree found on an island in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_G]. It is said to be the source of the Aether that collects around the lake.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_I_Queen
string.body: Nightbloom Queen's Hill; A secluded hill in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_I] where the largest of the Nightbloom flowers grows.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_B2_Ship
string.body: Barthor's Landing; An area in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_B2] where shipwreck debris can be found.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_C_Cellatu
string.body: Cellatun Circle; The ritual circle of the Cellatu in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_C]. They appear in numbers when it rains.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_E_Cave
string.body: Erasmid Hollow; A dreary cave in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_F2_Square
string.body: Death's Respite; A ruined building haunted by ancient Daeva heroes in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_F2].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF3_VakarmaArmy_Hill
string.body: Bakarma Legion Garrison Hill; A hill near the Balaur garrison you can find in the deep north after passing [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G5].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDDreadgion_04
string.body: Ashunatal Dredgion;A Dredgion frigate led by Brigade General Ashunatal. The remnants of Tiamat's forces are on board.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5_Fortress_War
string.body: Idgel Dome Landmark; An ancient Danuar arena that was discovered in Kaldor. It's said to contain powerful relics.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5_Under_02_War
string.body: Ophidan Warpath; A place where important research items of the Beritra forces are hidden through Shugo technology and debris.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5_Fortress_War_SZ_sqaure
string.body: Landmark Square; A round arena located at the center of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5_Fortress_War].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF_Tower_Dejabobo_Room
string.body: Room of the Sage;The place where Dejabobo, Sage of the Tower is resting inside the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF_Tower]. Can be reached through [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LF_Tower_FOBJ_Sage_Room_Q_Entrance].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SensoryArea_Q10527a
string.body: Magic Spice Traces;Traces of Agent Viola's magic spice. Can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_F1]. They show where Dejabobo, the Sage of the Tower, stayed for a longer time.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SensoryArea_Q10527b
string.body: Faint Magic Spice Traces;Traces of Agent Viola's magic spice. Can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_H2]. They show where Dejabobo, the Sage of the Tower, stayed for a longer time.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SensoryArea_Q10527c
string.body: Clear Magic Spice Traces;Traces of Agent Viola's magic spice. Can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_B1]. They show where Dejabobo, the Sage of the Tower, stayed for a longer time.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SensoryArea_Q10528a
string.body: Secret Pirate Cave; The place where Barthor hid [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LF6_FOBJ_Bling_Treasure_Q10528a]. Located in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_B2] in Iluma.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF6_SensoryArea_Q10528b
string.body: Hidden Sky Island; The sky island where the protection artifact is secretly built. Can be reached through [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LF6_FOBJ_Transport_Device_Q10528a].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDF6_Q
string.body: Aether Mine; The closest Aether Mine to the Tower of Eternity. Here, the protection artifact was built in secret.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF_Tower_Wizabobo_Room
string.body: Room of the Sage; The place where the Wejabobo, Sage of the Tower is resting inside the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF_Tower]. Can be reached through the corridor near corridor maintenance soldier [%dic:STR_DIC_N_DF6_Varotta_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SensoryArea_Q20527a
string.body: Conjuring Spice Traces; Traces of Agent Peregrine's magic spice. Can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_F1]. They show where Wejabobo, the Sage of the Tower, stayed for a longer time.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SensoryArea_Q20528a
string.body: Anima's Secret Habitat;The place where Animus hid [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_DF6_FOBJ_Bling_Treasure_Q20528a]. Located in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_B2] in Norsvold.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF6_SensoryArea_Q20528b
string.body: Hidden Sky Island; The sky island where the Protection Artifact is secretly built. Can be reached through [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_DF6_FOBJ_Transport_Device_Q20528a].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDEternity_02
string.body: Cradle of Eternity;A place that used to observe Atreia and document observations. It is accessible through the gate in Lakrum.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDEternity_02_SZ_B
string.body: Sylfaen Garden; This place was probably used to watch Atreia. Now, it is in ruins.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDEternity_02_SZ_C_Boss
string.body: Vid's Secret Library;A place where stays the Water Jotun, one of the managers of the All-knowing Tree. He is guarding important records regarding Python.

string.name: STR_DIC_IDLUNA_SIEGE
string.body: Secret Munitions Factory; A mechanized factory run by [%dic:STR_DIC_IDLUNA_SIEGE_S2_Nepilim_Fi_N_Ah_01] where Maedrunerk's machines of war are built.

string.name: STR_DIC_IDLUNA_DEF
string.body: Contaminated Underpath;The last holdout against the infectious Maedrunerk Legion in the battle to stop the infection from spreading to Atreia.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTransform
string.body: Fissure of Oblivion;A distorted fissure that suddenly appeared in Atreia. Many research teams tried to investigate into it, but they seem to lose their memory before they can report anything.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTransform_SZ_A_01
string.body: Orkia Observatory;The square in ancient Atreia where the Aetheric Field Observatory can be found. It was here that the peace talks were carried out.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTransform_SZ_B_01
string.body: Orkia Ruins;Part of the fortress that surrounded the Orkia Observatory. It was destroyed when the Drakan Special Forces attacked.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTransform_SZ_C_01
string.body: Orkia Spire;The top of the Orkia Observatory. In the past, the Drakan Special Forces occupied this place.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTransform_SZ_C_02
string.body: Distorted Memory Seal;The place where the Archdaeva's memories were sealed by Empyrean Lord Siel following the Epic Cataclysm. It is protected by an [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDTransform_Boss].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDF6_LF1
string.body: Fallen Poeta;Part of Dark Poeta. The shifting chaos of the Tower of Eternity Fragment makes this strange dimension accessible.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDF6_Lap
string.body: Theobomos Test Chamber;Part of the the secret research lab. The shifting chaos of the Tower of Eternity Fragment makes this strange dimension accessible.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDF6_Adma
string.body: Adma's Fall;Part of the Adma Stronghold. The shifting chaos of the Tower of Eternity Fragment makes this strange dimension accessible.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDF6_Dragon
string.body: Drakenseer's Lair;Part of the Draupnir Cave. The shifting chaos of the Tower of Eternity Fragment makes this strange dimension accessible.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDLC1_Dreadgion
string.body: Battleground Sanctum;Sanctum while it is being attacked by the Dredgion Frigate belonging to the Frigida Frigida Legion of Ereshkigal. A fierce battle is ensuing between Elyos and Balaur.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDDC1_Dreadgion
string.body: Battleground Pandaemonium;Pandaemonium while it is being attacked by the Dredgion Frigate belonging to the Frigida Frigida Legion of Ereshkigal. A fierce battle is ensuing between the Asmodians and Balaur.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTM_Lobby_01
string.body: Hall of Tenacity;One of the training camps of Ancient Atreia that was discovered by Shugos of the Red Sand Traders and is now being run by them.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTM_Arena_01
string.body: Arena of Tenacity;An arena for one-on-one duels where contestants can prove their strength, regardless of their race. The arena is run by Shugos of the Red Sand Traders.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDEternity_War_Center
string.body: Temple of Origin;The Jotun temple that is located right in the middle of Evergale Canyon.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDEternity_War_East
string.body: Eastern Part of Evergale Canyon;Refers to the Eon Anvil and the Eternal Anvil in the eastern part of Evergale Canyon.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDEternity_War_West
string.body: Western Part of Evergale Canyon;Refers to the Northern Cave and the Southern Cave in the western part of Evergale Canyon.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDEternity_War_Habitat_01
string.body: Unused

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDEternity_War_Habitat_02
string.body: Unused

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDEternity_War_Cave_01
string.body: Northern Cave;A cave located in the northwest of Evergale Canyon. A voice comes from it, asking for help.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDEternity_War_Cave_02
string.body: Southern Cave;A cave located in the southwest of Evergale Canyon. A voice comes from it, asking for help.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDEternity_War
string.body: Evergale Canyon;The abandoned ruins of the ancient Jotun city that transformed under the influence of the core fragment.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_Ere
string.body: Bastion of Souls;Many Daevas were said to have been brought to this place after they were taken by the Balaur during the Frigida Dredgion Invasion. Located in Lakrum.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_Ere_04
string.body: Incarna Prison Camp;The prison camp where the Daevas that were taken during the Frigida Dredgion Invasion are held. It is located inside of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_Ere].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_Ere_22
string.body: Guidance Chamber;The room of Warden Mahorosh, who is in charge of the Daevas at the Incarna Prison Camp. It is located inside of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_Ere].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_Ere_32
string.body: Path of Serenity Passage;A windstream that connects the Path of Serenity and the Incarna Prison Camp. Can be found inside of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_Ere].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_Ere_34
string.body: Path of Serenity;The path leading from Incarna Prison Camp to the Altar of Serenity. Can be found inside of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_Ere].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_Ere_35
string.body: Incarna Roots;An area blocked by giant Incarna roots. Can be found inside of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_Ere].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_Ere_36
string.body: Altar of Serenity;An area where four Harvesters are using their magic to make the Incarna grow faster. Can be found inside of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_Ere].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_Ere_Entrance
string.body: Frigida Dredgion Destination;Where the invading Frigida Dredgion arrived. An entrance to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_Ere] can be found there.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDEternity_War_named_12
string.body: Jotun Garden;A garden located east of the Temple of Origin. It still maintains much of its previous state.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDEternity_War_named_6
string.body: Ancient Altar;An altar located west of the Temple of Origin. It no longer looks anything like it once did.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDEternity_03
string.body: Trials of Eternity;An area that can be reached through the Remnants of Eternity inside the Tower of Eternity. Here, all knowledge of the world of Aion is created, categorized, and terminated.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDEternity_02_SZ_Boss
string.body: Library of Insight;Refers to the library at the center of the Trials of Eternity. Here, knowledge about the world of Aion is created.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_IDAbre_Core_03_A1_04
string.body: Soul Vault;An area where the Soul Icon is kept and protected by the Soul Icon Protection Stone. Located inside the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_03].

string.body: Altar of Respite;The Soul Icon is restored here through witchcraft. Located inside the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_03].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_Heroes
string.body: Frozen Monolith;Includes the symbol and tower that boosts and expands the Ereshkigal Legion's influence from the Divine Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDEvent_Def

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDRun
string.body: Treasure Island of Enrichment;An unknown island that Gogoshunerk discovered. It holds mysterious treasures but is shrouded in an ominous aura.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDNovice
string.body: Haramel;A place where Corrupt Daeva Hamerun brainwashed innocent workers to process Odium and Odella.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF3
string.body: Heiron;A place where a lost civilization prospered in the past. It is only open to those authorized to enter.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDLF3Lp
string.body: Aetherogenetics Lab;A research center that the Lephar Revolutionaries built in the northwest of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3]. It produced Rotron and Undeads in the Deathsong Forest.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_Q62218
string.body: Lichenstep Path;A habitat of rotrons and ribbits. The Beritra Legion often attacks the Aetheric Field here, causing serious trouble to the ongoing expeditions.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDSeal_60
string.body: Drakenspire Depths;Meaning Forbidden Sanctuary in its original name in the Balaur language, it is the final destination of Beritra.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDTiamat_SZ_T1_60
string.body: Dragon Lord's Refuge;An abode of the Dragon Lord Tiamat. It is accessible through [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDTiamat_2_F5_FOBJ_Entrance_60].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_ID_01_60
string.body: Heavy Mist Cliff;Here lies [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDTiamat_2_F5_FOBJ_Entrance_60] that stores the last moment of the Dragon Lord Tiamat.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_ID_03_60
string.body: Ruinhold Scatterings;Here lies [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDSeal_F5_FOBJ_Entrance] that stores the moment when the evil plans of Lord Beritra were stopped.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_OP_03_a
string.body: Red Tree Valley;Here [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LF5_DreamReader_E], the youngest of the Three Dream Readers, is waiting for [%username].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDF7_Weapon
string.body: Primeth's Forge;Blacksmith Primeth's workshop, which is now occupied by the Ereshkigal Legion. It is accessible through [%dic:STR_DIC_E_OBJ_IDF7_Weapon_Entrance].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_IDF7_Weapon_A
string.body: Workshop Entrance;An accessway to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDF7_Weapon].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_IDF7_Weapon_B
string.body: Lym Ore Loading Bay;The Lym ores plundered from Lakrum were transported to this place. It is guarded by the Balaur Followers of Ereshkigal.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_IDF7_Weapon_D
string.body: Lym Ore Storage;The Lym ores transported from the loading bay are stored here. It is guarded by Captains Yastikan and Varakan of the 39th Legion.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_IDF7_Weapon_F
string.body: Lym Ore Grinding Site;Here Lym ores are finely ground to be processed easily. It is supervised by the 39th Legion Supervisor Gersh.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_IDF7_Weapon_G
string.body: Primeth Workstation;A workstation of Primeth, the great Jotun blacksmith. Primeth is being held here by the Ereshkigal Legion.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_IDF7_Weapon_J
string.body: Lym Ore Dissolving Room;The ground Lym ores are dissolved here. It is supervised by the Frigida Legion Commander Tarukan.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_IDF7_Weapon_J_01
string.body: Bellow Air Duct;A passage between Primeth's Forge's furnace and the Dissolving Room. Defeat the Legion Commander Tarukan to use this passage.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_IDF7_Weapon_K
string.body: Primeth Furnace;Lym ores are melted here to be processed into various items. It is now occupied by the Brigade General Frigida.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_LDF7_Art_01
string.body: Meadow Gate;A capturable base in Lakrum. Here exists an artifact called Pioneer's Grace.

string.body: Temple Walk;A capturable base in Lakrum. Here exists an artifact called Rush of Battle.

string.body: Anvil Heart;A capturable base in Lakrum. Here exists an artifact called Adversity's Hope.

string.body: Cradle of Eternity;(Unused)

string.body: Capitol Building;A building where gather the commander-in-chief and senior officials of Pandaemonium to discuss important issues.

string.body: Asmodian's Main Route;A route that Asmodians frequently use to disrupt Elyos.

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_LDF7_LDF7_SensoryArea_Q60503a
string.body: Where Elyos Soldiers Disappeared;Elyos soldiers who left to help Atis' research went missing here.

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_LDF7_LDF7_SensoryArea_Q60504a
string.body: Balaur's Main Route;A route where Balaurs frequently appear and carry out missions.

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_LDF7_LDF7_SensoryArea_Q60504b
string.body: Cave Visited by Balaur;Balaurs secretly go in and out of this cave to collect something inside.

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_LDF7_LDF7_SensoryArea_Q70503a
string.body: Where Asmodian Soldiers Disappeared;Asmodian soldiers who left to help Rith' research went missing here.

string.body: Balaur Lurking Area;An area where Balaurs frequently appear.

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_LDF7_LDF7_SensoryArea_Q70504b
string.body: Cave Used by Balaur;Balaurs secretly go in and out of this cave to collect something inside.

string.body: Ancient Red Tree Forest;A forest dense with large trees, which grow incredibly tall under the influence of the surrounding divine energy.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF7_SZ_D1
string.body: Concealed Mine;A mine located at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF7_SZ_D]. The Balaur are secretly running it.

string.body: Wood Forest Zone 3;(Unused)

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_E
string.body: Shaded Pine Forest;A coniferous forest occupying a large area in front of the Lakrum Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_E1
string.body: Lakrum Fortress;A fortress located at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_E]. Inside the fortress is the door to the Great Temple of Jotun.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_E2
string.body: Frigida Legion Outpost;The a Legion outpost located at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_E].

string.body: Endorim Temple;A temple built by the Jotun of Lakrum, believed to be used as a place to deliberate important decisions.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_F1
string.body: Endorim Conference Hall: A place in Lakrum where the Jotun gathered to make important decisions.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_F2
string.body: Endorim Temple Gate;A gate that you must pass through to get to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_F].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_G
string.body: Devastated Coast;A coast where Elyos and Asmodians fought fiercely when they first came to Lakrum.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_G1
string.body: Frigida Legion Observation Base;An observation base located at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_G].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_G2
string.body: Quiet Eerie Cave;A cave located in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_G]. It is eerie and quiet.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_LOP1
string.body: Ancient Sanctum of Life;A temple built by the Jotun of Lakrum. The Elyos in Lakrum are using it as their bind point.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_LOP2
string.body: Hymn of Aion Legion Garrison;A garrison where stay Agent Viola and the Tunes of Splendor Legion dispatched to support the elimination of Ereshkigal.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_LOP3
string.body: Guardian Outpost;An outpost that the Elyos built to oversee a temple in Lakrum.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_DOP1
string.body: Ancient Temple of Wisdom;A temple built by the Jotun of Lakrum. The Asmodian in Lakrum are using it as their bind point.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_DOP2
string.body: Archon's Shadow Legion Garrison;A garrison where stay Agent Feregran and the Archon's Shadow Legion dispatched to support the elimination of Ereshkigal.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_DOP3
string.body: Archon Outpost;An outpost that the Asmodian built to capture the Great Temple of Lakrum.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF7
string.body: Lakrum (Unused);A place where stands a great temple that enshrines the relic that Aion infused with some of its power. Forgotten for a long time, Lakrum maintains the primitive environment and hosts many plants transformed by the relic.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDSeal_F2P
string.body: Infernal Drakenspire Depths;Means 'prohibited sanctum' in the Balaur language. A memory of the past remains there from when Ereshkigal was sealed away by Fregion.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_OP_03_a
string.body: Mysterious Ruins;Here Daeva of Psychic Arts Drinde is waiting for [%username].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_A1_Under
string.body: Destroyed Drana Farm;A Balaur Drana Farm located in the south of the Gelkmaros Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDCubic
string.body: Qubrinerk's Cubic Lab;Qubrinerk researched Cubics here before its takeover by Madrukin's Shulacks. If you occupy the Lakrum base, the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDCubic_Entrance] will sometimes appear and allow you to enter the lab.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDCubic_Enter
string.body: Collapsed Lab Entrance;The entrance to the outside of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDCubic].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDCubic_Outside
string.body: Outside of the Lab;A passage that leads to the entrance of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDCubic]. The lab is occupied by Madrukin's Shulacks.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDCubic_Office
string.body: Captured Cubic Lab;The lab where Qubrinerk was researching and developing her Cubics in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDCubic]. Right now, it is occupied by the Shulack Madrukin who is after the Cubics.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDF7_Ere
string.body: The Veilenthrone;An ancient temple located beneath Lakrum Fortress. It is said that the Jotun kept unspeakable treasures there.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDBattle_Change
string.body: Illumiel Brawl;A training ground crafted by Lady Lumiel. The Lifekeeper and Veilbreaker Legions often come into conflict here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_B9
string.body: Marut Stone Mountain;A rugged mountain. The rocks quarried from here were used to build the nearby outpost.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8
string.body: Demaha;A new Balaurea region discovered by [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Stella_Industry]. In the distant past, Apsu ruled over these lands. But when Tiamat murdered Apsu to become a Balaur Lord, it was forgotten and turned into a wasteland.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_LOP
string.body: Outpost of Victory;An outpost created with the help of [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Stella_Industry] for the Elyos who entered [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_DOP
string.body: Outpost of Prosperity;An outpost created with the help of [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Stella_Industry] for the Asmodians who entered [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_B1
string.body: The Highlands;The sloped highland of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8]. [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Rega] is active in these lands.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_B2
string.body: Edoma Mountain;Plains in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8] with a small hill. [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Rega] is active in these lands.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_B3
string.body: Regatus Garrison;A region of plains and highlands in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8]. A new Balaur organization called [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Rega] is based here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_D
string.body: Suhara Desert (West);These private lands were cultivated by [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8] for their business purposes. This area is used to manage the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Naki6] that is distributed in [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Stella_Industry]. Can be found south of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_E
string.body: Unrepentant Wastes;A dry desert region of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8]. This area is inhabited by the Apmaha, who worship the ancient dragon Apsu.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_F
string.body: Abyssal Dunes;An area located at the center of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8]. It consists of great amounts of sand sliding into a bottomless pit.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_G1
string.body: Lawless Wastes (North);The northern region of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_G_All]. It is a chaotic place full of miscreants and vagrants.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_G2
string.body: Lawless Wastes (South);The southern region of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_G_All]. It is a chaotic place full of miscreants and vagrants.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_K1
string.body: Boiling Geyser;A volcanic area located south of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8]. There are parts of it with hot springs.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_K2
string.body: Circle of Rebirth;A volcanic region southwest of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8]. The remnants of the destroyed [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Rega] moved south and are occupying it now.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_K3
string.body: The Burning Path;A volcanic region southeast of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8]. Lava from an active volcano is flowing in this region.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_K4
string.body: Ashwind Cliff;A volcano cliff in the south of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8]. The smoke and the gas from the volcano fills this place with a terrible stench.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1
string.body: Stellusia;A crucial base erected by [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Stella_Industry] for the official exploration and excavation of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8]. It is the most important development area in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8]. Both Elyos and Asmodians are here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_F_L_Mission
string.body: Temporary ST Laboratory;A temporary laboratory of [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Stella_Industry] that was closed down for failed clinical experiments. Can be found at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_F].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_F_D_Mission
string.body: Temporary ST Testing Grounds;A temporary laboratory of [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Stella_Industry] that was closed down for failed clinical experiments. Can be found at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_F].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_E_L_Mission
string.body: Chieftain Bennu's Village;After stealing the ST-IX, Chieftain Bennu is leading this village in the battle against Stellin.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_E_D_Mission
string.body: Chieftain Amnu's Village;After stealing the ST-IX, Chieftain Amnu is leading this village in the battle against Stellin.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mssion01
string.body: Regatus Headquarters;The hidden headquarters of [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Rega]. [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF8_Mission_Drakan_Boss_03_Al], the leader of the Regatus, and his personal guards are staying here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mssion02
string.body: Vishaka's Hideout;The Regatus leader [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF8_Mission_Drakan_Boss_03_Al] and Vishaka's guards are hiding here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mission03
string.body: Secret ST Research Center;The top secret [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Naki6] facility. The development and manufacturing of [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Stella_Industry] happens here, and the[%dic:STR_DIC_E_Lord_Legacy] that can be found all over [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8] are transported to here for secret research.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1_Rest
string.body: Gates of Joy;A welfare facility of [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Stella_Industry], located at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP1]. It is known as a shelter for homeless beings; providing food and a place to stay.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_G_All
string.body: Lawless Wastes;A vicious area where miscreants and vagrants gather, and law is meaningless. It has such a bad reputation that most people avoid it.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_Inanna_Inside_In
string.body: Inanna's Consciousness;A place deep within Inanna's mind that was separated from her. It contains all of the miserable memories from her past and it seems that somehow, she is trapped here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mission03_Step4
string.body: Main Storage Room;A place where the main materials to make ST-IX are kept. Can be found at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mission03].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mission03_Step5
string.body: Clinical Test Lab;A lab where researchers try to improve the quality of ST-IX. Can be found at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mission03].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mission03_Step7
string.body: Extraction Room;A room where the power from the material stored in the Main Storage Room is extracted. It separates the pure power which is the core of ST-IX and the remaining residue, and then sends it on through another tube. Can be found at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mission03].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mission03_Step8
string.body: Test Subject Preservation Area;A place where the test subjects are stored before they go to the Clinical Test Lab. Can be found at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mission03].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mission03_Step9
string.body: Top Secret Storage Room;A hidden top secret place within the Test Subject Preservation Area. Various Balaur test subjects are stored here for unknown purposes.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mission03_Step11
string.body: Intensive Care Ascension Room;The only thing known about this chamber is that it is important.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_A1
string.body: Valley Oasis;Located in the northwest of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8], it is surrounded by precipices.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_A2
string.body: Edoma Submontane;Northern region of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8]. This place is full of large trees, cliffs, and waterfalls.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_A3
string.body: Valley of Sorrow;Located in the northeast of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8], it is surrounded by precipices.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_C1
string.body: Suhara Canyon;The place where the plains and the desert of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8] meet. It is surrounded by high cliffs.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_C2
string.body: Suhara Desert (East);The place where the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8] desert begins. There is a small pool here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_H
string.body: Paikuli Falls;Located in the eastern [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8]. This is the habitat of Paikuli the Enraged.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_I
string.body: Desert Ruins Excavation Site;Located in the southwest of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8]. This place can be valuable for development, as it still has large ruins devoted to Apsu.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_J1
string.body: Volcano Ruins Excavation Site;Located in the southeast of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8]. There are still untouched ruins devoted to Apsu here, so it could be valuable for research.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_J2
string.body: Great Priest Dunu's Temple;Located in the southeast of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8]. The development isn't very far advanced yet, so the region is still mainly unknown.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SV_5021
string.body: The 1st Altar;An altar made by the Apmaha to worship Apsu. Can be found at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SV_5022
string.body: The 2nd Altar;An altar made by the Apmaha to worship Apsu. Can be found at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SV_5023
string.body: The 3rd Altar;An altar made by the Apmaha to worship Apsu. Can be found at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SV_5024
string.body: The 4th Altar;An altar made by the Apmaha to worship Apsu. Can be found at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SV_5025
string.body: The 5th Altar;An altar made by the Apmaha to worship Apsu. Can be found at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SV_5026
string.body: The 6th Altar;An altar made by the Apmaha to worship Apsu. Can be found at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8].

string.body: The 7th Altar;An altar made by the Apmaha to worship Apsu. Can be found at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8].

string.body: The 8th Altar;An altar made by the Apmaha to worship Apsu. Can be found at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SV_5029
string.body: The 9th Altar;An altar made by the Apmaha to worship Apsu. Can be found at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SV_5030
string.body: The 10th Altar;An altar made by the Apmaha to worship Apsu. Can be found at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SV_5031
string.body: The 11th Altar;An altar made by the Apmaha to worship Apsu. Can be found at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP2
string.body: Sandcastle Base;A base created for the exploration of the Demaha Desert ruins. Located in the southwest of Demaha.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_OP3
string.body: Volcano Ruins Base;A base created for the exploration of the Demaha Volcano ruins. Located in the southeast of Demaha.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDLDF8_Lab
string.body: Stellin Laboratory;ST-IX was being produced here, but something must have happened as communication has been cut off. Can be found at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_D_IDLDF8].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDLDF8_Lab_Top_Floor
string.body: Stellin Laboratory Top Floor;This is the highest floor of the laboratory where the research rooms are located. Can be found at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF8_Lab].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_IDLDF8_Lab_SZ_D1
string.body: Closed Laboratory;Important research of [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Stella_Industry] regarding ST-IX is done here. It has been closed down by a security system. [%dic:STR_DIC_M_BIDLDF8_LAB_Boss_04_80_Ah] is here.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_IDLDF8_Lab_SZ_A1
string.body: Waste Disposal Facility;A place where waste from the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF8_Lab] is disposed. Can be found at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF8_Lab].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_IDLDF8_Lab_SZ_C3
string.body: ST Laboratory;Various experiments and prototypes for [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Stella_Industry] are developed here. Can be found at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF8_Lab].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_IDLDF8_Lab_SZ_B3
string.body: Research Room;The research for [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Stella_Industry] products to be supplied to the market is done here. Can be found at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF8_Lab].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_IDLDF8_Lab_SZ_B2
string.body: Distribution;This place contains the stocks of [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Naki6_K] that are to be distributed to the market. Can be found at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF8_Lab].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_IDLDF8_Lab_SZ_C2
string.body: ST Production Room;This is where [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF8_Lab] produces ST. As a precaution, the room is wired to self-destruct to protect the materials list and production method of ST. Can be found at [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Stella_Industry].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_IDLDF8_Lab_SZ_C1
string.body: 2nd Floor Hallway;The 2nd floor hallway of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF8_Lab].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_LDF8_SZ_1921
string.body: Demaha Fortress;A fortress at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_B3_Lega
string.body: Regatus Guard Post;A guard post set up to keep watch over the garrison of the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Rega], a new Balaur organization.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_D_IDLDF8
string.body: Stellin Industrial Complex;An industrial complex located in southern [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8]. Industrial facilities can be found there.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_K1_L_MissionSpot01
string.body: Inanna's Hideout;The place [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF8_K_Inanna_L_E] is hiding. Located at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_K1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_K1_D_MissionSpot01
string.body: Inanna's Refuge;The spot [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF8_K_Inanna_D_E] is hiding. Located at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_K1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mission04
string.body: Scaleshadow;Where Inanna first met Benirunerk. She and Benirunerk were held prisoner by the Naduka Drakan.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_K1_MissionSpot02
string.body: Valley Prison Camp;A prison camp managed by the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Rega] that moved southward. They mainly keep weakened slaves here. Can be found at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_K1].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDF8_House
string.body: Benirunerk's Estate;The home of Stellin Industries leader Benirunerk. A party for every Daeva who assisted Stellin Industries is hosted here. Can be entered through [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDF8_House_Entrance].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_LDF8_fightClub_1
string.body: Underground Training Center;An facility in Stellusia that Stellin Industries built to train their employees. Can be accessed through the passage behind the teleporter.

string.body: Mysterious Valley;It was closed off for unknown reasons.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_LDF5b_SZ_A3_2
string.body: Whistling Valley;The wind whistles whenever it blows through this valley.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_LDF5b_SZ_A3_3
string.body: Snowmelt's Edge;The outer reaches of the region, where the snow is beginning to melt.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_LDF5b_SZ_E1_2
string.body: Goldrine Residential District;A neutral zone governed by Goldrine Ltd. in Crimson Danaria.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_LDF5b_SZ_F1
string.body: Beritra Southern Defense Line;The Southern region where the battle against Beritra rages on.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_STR_LDF5b_SZ_F1_1

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_IDF8_M4_2
string.body: Scaleshadow Weapons Lab;A facility inside [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mission04]. Slaves are kept here to help with the development of weapons and other technology.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_SZ_IDF8_M4_7
string.body: Mournful Bridge;A bridge inside [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDF8_Mission04]. Travelers must pass by here to find the exit.
